Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
public class representing the personal board associated to a player

    void addFaith​(int amount)
    moves the faith marker ahead in the faith track and starts a vatican report if a player reached or passed the end of a section

      Throws:

    • discardLeaderCard

      public boolean discardLeaderCard​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> leaderStatus)
      removes the selected leader card from the list without adding faith points
      Parameters:
      leaderStatus - indicates the positions of the card and if they have to be removed
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if if the leader card doesn't exist

    • getTotalPoints

      public int getTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      returns the total victory points once the game is ended according to the cards and resources left

      public int getTotalResources()
      Returns:

    • addFaith

      public void addFaith​(int amount)
      moves the faith marker ahead in the faith track and starts a vatican report if a player reached or passed the end of a section
      Parameters:
      amount - indicates how many positions have to be added to the faith marker

    • addFaithToOthers

      public void addFaithToOthers​(int amount)

      Parameters:
      amount - equals the amount of resources discarded

    • getResourceStatus

      public java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getResourceStatus()
      This method returns a Map which contains information about all the resources present in strongbox and warehouse.
      Returns:
      Map(Resource,Integer) Integer represents the amount of the resource (the key)

    • checkCards

      public boolean checkCards​(CardColor cardColor, int level, int quantity) throws InvalidActionException
      This method checks if there are at least 'quantity' development cards which have color equals to 'cardColor' and level equals to 'level'.
      Parameters:
      cardColor - the color of the cards searched
      level - the level of the cards searched
      quantity - the quantity required
      Returns:
      true if the requirements are met
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the requirements are not met.

    • showSlot

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> showSlot()
      Shows the status of the slots
      Returns:
      Map(Integer,String) which represents the number of slot and the ID of the card present in the slot itself

    • showLeaderPosition

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> showLeaderPosition()

      Returns:
